title: AVG PC Tuneup v12.0.4020.3 Final
description:
AVG PC Tuneup v12.0.4020.3 Final Installer-2010kaiser
              =====================================================



                N.B.:THIS INSTALLER MUST BE RAN AS ADMINISTRATOR
                ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


With AVG PC TuneUp you can perform important tasks such as cleaning the hard drive and registry, either automatically or manually. Disorder in the system and slow work remain in the past. AVG PC TuneUp recognizes the existence of problems in your system and offers simple solutions to address them. In addition, with the help of AVG PC TuneUp you can completely change the appearance of your Windows system to suit personal preferences.

The new interface running AVG PC TuneUp offers a centralized development of all the functions and capabilities of adjustment. The main area of the interface running AVG PC TuneUp is divided into five categories, which are open to you fast and grouped by subject access to the most important functions of AVG PC TuneUp.

- Status and recommendations. In the category of State and recommendations you will get an overview of the current state of your system and recommendations on how to improve the condition. Displays the protection status of your system.
- Optimization of the system. In the category of "system optimization" you can deactivate or delete unwanted programs and clean up your system and data.
- Free up disk space. In the category of "Free up disk space" you can systematically remove unnecessary data from your system.
- Troubleshooting. In the category of "Troubleshooting" you will find simple solutions to potential problems.
- Setting up Windows. Category Customize Windows offers numerous opportunities to customize the workspace to suit your preferences.



System Requirements:
====================

Processor 300 MHz or faster
Memory 256 MB of RAM
Screen Resolution At least 1024 x 600 pixels


Operating Systems:
==================

Windows XP Pro x64 Edition, Vista, 7, 8
Architecture:  x32bit - x64bit
